text: Rupert Keith Murdoch (born March 11, 1931) is an Australian-American media owner. He became managing director for Australia-based network News Limited after his father Keith died. He is founder, Chairman and chief executive officer of global media network News Corporation (the world's second largest media group). His mother Elisabeth Murdoch died on December 5, 2012. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:American billionaires Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Australian chief executives Category:Fox Broadcasting Company Category:News Corporation Category:Order of Australia Category:People from Adelaide Category:People from Melbourne Category:Publishers
title: Rupert Murdoch
